typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(each(match(name == 'AverageRating'), 'avgratingnice' = toString(round(toInteger($$))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:[('PrimaryGenre'),('year'),('AverageRating')],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
